refnamediv.refpurpose: Get log detail by level, log_path, key_word, start, limit, order

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
level
String. The log information level.
log_path
String. The log information path.
key_word
String. The search key word for log information.
start
Int. Default is `1`.
limit
Int. Default is `20`.
order
Int. Default is SEASLOG_DETAIL_ORDER_ASC. See also:
SEASLOG_DETAIL_ORDER_ASC SEASLOG_DETAIL_ORDER_DESC
